attic.build-three: node bin/build3modules.js; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs libs/threelibs -d libs/threelibs
attic.build-as: mkdir lib; babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-systemjs src -d lib

scripts.postinstall: npm run mkdirs && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf `node bin/pkgkey.js mkdirs` && npm run mkdirs
scripts.zip: rm asx.zip; zip -r asx.zip dist libs src test models
scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-docs && npm run build-deps
scripts.build-src: npm run build-test && npm run build-models && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-dist: npm run build-bundle && cp -Rp src dist/modules
scripts.watch: npm run watch-test & npm run watch-models & npm run watch-bundle
scripts.git-tag: git tag -a 'v2.0.0' # Change vx.x.x, change version: above
scripts.git-prep: npm run build && git add --all && git status
scripts.git-commit: git commit -v && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.make-page: git merge master && npm run clean && npm run build && git add --all && git add -f docs test/scripts models/scripts dist libs && git commit -m 'master merge'
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && npm run make-page && git push origin gh-pages --follow-tags && git checkout master
